messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Official Millennium Quantum Global Peace Meditation
messages.msgSnippet: I think I ll just seek the Lord in my secret closet.  He alone holds the future. Carla Raley Jacksboro, Texas As for me and my house, we will serve the Lord.
messages.messageBody:
I think I'll just seek the Lord in my secret closet. He alone holds the
future.
Carla Raley
Jacksboro, Texas
As for me and my house, we will serve the Lord. Joshua 24:15
----- Original Message -----
From: "Nicoletta Manns" <snmanns@...>
To: <Undisclosed-Recipient:@...;>
Sent: Monday, October 30, 2000 7:13 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Official Millennium Quantum Global Peace
Meditation


> The 01/01/01 OM (Official Millennium Quantum Global Peace Meditation)
>
> Dear Friend,
>
> This is Ken Kalb, LightShift 2000
> http://www.lightshift.com
>
> It is now just 2 months to the Official Millennium -- Time for all
> people of goodwill to unite from our inner light to ignite the divinity
> in all humanity.
>
> We humbly invite you to join in meditation, prayer, song, drumbeat,
> dance, or whichever way you best connect with Spirit on 1/1/1 at
> Midnite.
>
> Please see:
> http://www.lightshift.com/Inspiration/millennium.html
>
> and the "pay it forward" principle
>
>
> I would appreciate it if you would network this vigorously to empower
> this wonderful initiative.
> With all the years of growth and promotion, I sincerely believe we can
> reach quantum numbers and a true critical mass of radiant human
> catalysts.
>
> Last January 1st, between 20 and 50 million people participated in the
> 29-hour global prayer wave -- very possibly a "critical mass" of radiant
> human catalysts empowering the smooth transition into the millennial
> year.
>
> You helped create the miracle of no terrorism, few incidents, accidents,
> Y2K problems, and an end to end-time negative millenial prophecy by
> fertilizing the unified field of consciousness with grace.
>
> There are several new tools on the LightShift 2000 website to assist
> networking:
> A Network email button at the top of the site A New 2-sided
> Printable Flyer (scroll to the "Print Flyer" button") and Several new
> articles, time zone resources, and more at:
>
> http://www.lightshift.com
>
> There is also a thought provoking article on the Presidential Race by
> Joan Harvey at:
> www.lightshift.com/Inspiration/third_party.html
>
> May Peace Prevail on Earth
>
> Ken Kalb
> LightShift 2000
>
> http://www.lightshift.com
> Let's Turn on the Light of the World
>

messages.subject: Official Millennium Quantum Global Peace Meditation
messages.msgSnippet: The 01/01/01 OM (Official Millennium Quantum Global Peace Meditation) Dear Friend, This is Ken Kalb, LightShift 2000 http://www.lightshift.com It is now just 2
messages.messageBody:
The 01/01/01 OM (Official Millennium Quantum Global Peace Meditation)

Dear Friend,

This is Ken Kalb, LightShift 2000
http://www.lightshift.com

It is now just 2 months to the Official Millennium -- Time for all
people of goodwill to unite from our inner light to ignite the divinity
in all humanity.

We humbly invite you to join in meditation, prayer, song, drumbeat,
dance, or whichever way you best connect with Spirit on 1/1/1 at
Midnite.

Please see:
http://www.lightshift.com/Inspiration/millennium.html

and the "pay it forward" principle


I would appreciate it if you would network this vigorously to empower
this wonderful initiative.
With all the years of growth and promotion, I sincerely believe we can
reach quantum numbers and a true critical mass of radiant human
catalysts.

Last January 1st, between 20 and 50 million people participated in the
29-hour global prayer wave -- very possibly a "critical mass" of radiant
human catalysts empowering the smooth transition into the millennial
year.

You helped create the miracle of no terrorism, few incidents, accidents,
Y2K problems, and an end to end-time negative millenial prophecy by
fertilizing the unified field of consciousness with grace.

There are several new tools on the LightShift 2000 website to assist
networking:
A Network email button at the top of the site A New 2-sided
Printable Flyer (scroll to the "Print Flyer" button") and Several new
articles, time zone resources, and more at:

http://www.lightshift.com

There is also a thought provoking article on the Presidential Race by
Joan Harvey at:
www.lightshift.com/Inspiration/third_party.html

May Peace Prevail on Earth

Ken Kalb
LightShift 2000

http://www.lightshift.com
Let's Turn on the Light of the World
